ai-thag1.120:1.1_0: The five aggregates are fully understood;
ai-thag1.120:1.2_0: they remain, but their root is cut.
ai-thag1.120:1.3_0: I have reached the end of suffering
ai-thag1.120:1.4_0: and attained the ending of defilements.
ai-thag1.120:2.2_0: like a calf shoot on a wound.
ai-thag1.120:2.4_0: the reputations of fame and reputation,
ai-thag1.120:2.6_0: that Isidatta is the great hermit.
ai-thag1.120:2.7_0: The Book of the Ones is finished.
ai-thag1.120:3.0_0: Then they pass away from that host of gods
ai-thag1.120:3.2_0: they’ve completed the task and are free of defilements.
